Title: Goodbye and Good Luck
Plot: Sara questions her future as a CSI when a past case comes back to haunt her, the 12 year old Hannah, who has to back up her brother one more time with all new tricks up her sleeves.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Juliette Goglia, Douglas Smith, Jessica Lucas, Riley Smith, Archie Kao, David Berman, Onahoua Rodriguez, Sheeri Rappaport, Jon Wellner, Larry Sullivan, Rene L. Moreno, Zachary Abel, Holland Roden, Julianna Guill
